Reviews.Title: “low quality but great location”

Reviews.Content: located close campo dei fiori city hotel fashioned basic facilities lift noisy night plus free fast wifi

Reviews.Title: “Pomezia - dont trust them”
Reviews.Author: Disappointed519
Reviews.Content: visited hotel february hotel noon cold estimated 15 degrees couldnt fix heat own initiative checking visit reception charge 40 euros extra booked tried explain situation receptionist rude anxious didnt miss plane home forced pay tried mail afterwards course didnt answer definitely choose hotel
